entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
